pr_title: GH-2371 switch to rsx namespace for targetShape

timeline.message:
GH-2371 switch to rsx namespace for targetShape

Signed-off-by: Håvard Ottestad <hmottestad@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps leave off the Eclipse bit, just call it RDF4J_SHACL_EXTENSION?  Same for the actual getter/setter methods. Also fine if you prefer the longer version.
timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

replies.bodyText: I prefer the legitimacy of having it under eclipse rather than just RDF4J.
replies.author: hmottestad
